Desc.eng: I heard you are heading to the Gallowsbog! Did you know that the machine-men have a camp there? This is where they experiment of the werewolves.
Let me guess. You want me to let the werewolves free.
Heavens, no! Why would I want such a thing? No, I’m only interested in the strange substance that gets these Dreadknechts up and running. I will pay you generously.
Fine. I always wanted to see what’s inside those things.
I have no time for this.
Change your mind about that strange substance?
Fine. I always wanted to see what’s inside those things.
I have no time for this.
